solution_line_template: Kim got {easy_correct} points/round x {easy_point} round = <<{easy_correct}*{easy_point}={easy_points}>>{easy_points} points in the easy round.
She got {average_correct} points/round x {average_point} rounds = <<{average_correct}*{average_point}={average_points}>>{average_points} points in the average round.
She got {hard_correct} points/round x {hard_point} rounds = <<{hard_correct}*{hard_point}={hard_points}>>{hard_points} points in the difficult round.
So her total points is {easy_points} points + {average_points} points + {hard_points} points = <<{easy_points}+{average_points}+{hard_points}={total_points}>>{total_points} points.
